attributes.review: Honestly this app is the worst app out there in the Apple store This app brings so much competition in to my phone AND MY PHONE IS MY LIFE SO IT ALSO EFFECTS ME I would GIVE THIS USELESS APP A ZERO STARS!!!! And why do I say to not download good question this app does have so much competition and it’s not worth getting a bad app in a middle of a pandemic it will only stress y’all out so for Sike trust my WORDS this app isn’t worth your time and your mental health as a person that HAVE the app it’s not worth going what me and others went through over this app AGAIN this is not worth anything of yours DONT download for your sake!!! :(

attributes.review: Hello my fellow trumpets, I was so excited to support Daddy Trump but this app made HORRIBLE things happen. As soon as I downloaded my device started vibrating and playing a song that said “my boys got his own ringtone” it sounded so un-American and disgusting. I tried touch my phone but I got possessed my a leftist and started twerking to the song!!! 🤭 This will END America!! BAN THIS APP IN ALL OF THE 50 STATES! I’m still throwing it back as we speak! 😔
attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD!
